content.detailedDescription: As my friend, husband , grand daughter , and i were on our way home from a festival in maryland as we got closer to her home in wood bridge virginia , my friend said what the hell is that, i said what she said look up there , i looked up and there were four orbs going back, and forth, up and down then back together again , and quickly moving apart again,   at first i said mabey its a spot light , but then realized the way they were moving it couldn't be, my husband said no that's definitly something i started taking pictures on my cell phone , my friend said see if you can record it so i started recording then we could not see them anymore , we drove for a few minutes , and my grand daughter said they are still there , i rolled down my window and started to record again, my friend said , all these cars out here i know these people have to see this. i said some people never even look up, i tried to convince her to stop and pull off the road so we could get out and record but she refused so we kept on driving till we no longer saw them, when we got to the house and looked back at the recording we actually saw a disc with lights moving above us , and the four orbs going across the sky with a stream behind them as they moved really fast back , and forth.
content.summary: My friend my husband, granddaughter , and i were on way back to virginia after attending a festival , when we saw 4 orbs in sky ahead of us, thet started to move together then apart up and down, across the highway in very fast movements.

content.detailedDescription: At 0228  i noticed a light flickering off and on in the sky above the wasatch mountains i was in roy facing east as i noticed it moved from the north slowly to the south took almost an hour from when i first seen it to when i last. i would say it moved from above clearfield or layton more towards kaysville or further south and at 0300 i noticed another bright light more in the north where i first noticed the light in the beginning however this light was not flickering i took video of this with both my iphone5c and also with my dslr digital camera i took both photos and videos with my cameras. at 0330 i went to bed and stopped watching due to me having to take up at 0600 hrs. for my daughter who will be dropped off at that time oh and also at 0330 i emailed one of my friends who also watched the lights and took videos and photos of this light or these two different lights. i contacted my friend [name removed/cms/tg] who also took pictures with his camera phone and from his location.
content.summary: Bright flickering light observed in the sky above the mountains i thought it was an airliner at first but it just sat there and slowly moved from the north to the south i was facing east

content.detailedDescription: At 0228  i noticed a light flickering off and on in the sky above the wasatch mountains i was in roy facing east as i noticed it moved from the north slowly to the south took almost an hour from when i first seen it to when i last. i would say it moved from above clearfield or layton more towards kaysville or further south and at 0300 i noticed another bright light more in the north where i first noticed the light in the beginning however this light was not flickering i took video of this with both my iphone5c and also with my dslr digital camera i took both photos and videos with my cameras. at 0330 i went to bed and stopped watching due to me having to take up at 0600 hrs. for my daughter who will be dropped off at that time oh and also at 0330 i emailed one of my friends who also watched the lights and took videos and photos of this light or these two different lights.
content.summary: Strange flickering pulsating bright like brighter than all the other stars i thought it was a jet at first until it didnt move it just slowly moved south.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were staying at a friend's cabin on a 60 acre property set off 1/2 mile into the woods. the night was very clear, so clear we could see the milky way and the small satellites that circle the earth. we turned off all of the lights in the cabin and stood out in a field to take long exposure photographs of the sky. we rarely get to do this kind of activity, because we live in the city. at some point, as my friend was leaning down to setup another shot and  i was staring up at the night sky amazed by the amount of stars that could be seen with the naked eye, the ufo appeared above us. it was shaped like a boomerang and twirled quickly, silently across the sky. it was huge. from my perspective, i would say it appeared to be about 5 feet wide, but i sensed it was very high in the sky and could only imagine the true size to be much, much larger. and the shape was very sharp, i knew immediately it was made by an intelligent being. it glowed green, like the color of a glow stick, and it seemed that there were markings on the boomerang: a circle near the terminus of each "wing" and three thin lines on each side where the "wings" met at the center. the craft appeared, spun across the sky from east to west, and then disappeared in a second/second and 1/2; however, i saw so much detail because i was already staring at the sky when the craft appeared. my friend also saw the craft, but only the brightness of it, since she was looking up through her camera. her glimpse was of the ufo's brightness and the last instant of it's appearance.
content.summary: Spinning boomerang overhead, very clear, silent and fast

content.detailedDescription: It was a monday evening around 3:30-4:00 picking my son up from school. i noticed something bright in the sky wich i thought was a second sun or even a planet as i took the pictures i didnt realize what i had gotten untill later on in the week as i sorted thru my pictures..Then i realized i had got something verry interesting in the photos wich i hadnt seen..At first i thought sun glare but as i looked closer it was not what i thought..It was amazing and it was huge so i decided to share this event with my friends and family and muffon..
content.summary: Came from nowhere...

content.detailedDescription: Went out to talk to road workers we all saw what looked like a star pasing the moon going w to e very slow. i ran in house got a 4.85-48.5 mm samsung with zoom to take pictures, the pictures do not show a star the picture shows a large round gray area where the star waas each time. the camera would not capture the star but insted captured a round gray area as it moved east then just disapeard. i still get gouse bumps  the first and 2 picture just west of wire and about i/3 down on picture same on #2 and on 2054 center down i/4 of picture . i have other pictures as well.
content.summary: Star moving w to e very slow pictures changed what was observed pictures show large round gray area.

content.detailedDescription: Oct.5 2014,sunday morning a little after 8:00am was on the carport with a cup of coffee. i heard something howling in the woods in the front of the house. the neighbors dogs were raising sane. i went in the house and walked out the front door and let my dog out in a fenced in area. i was standing on the front porch looking toward the woods, when i first noticed it in the sky, i thought it was a jet contrail (a little short one). but as i kept looking at it i noticed it had two glowing orbs on each end of it, also it was not moving like a jet contrail would following a jet. the sun was to the right of it, from the position i was standing i was having to look into the sun. there was not a cloud in the sky other than that. i had my cellphone in my pocket, i  walked out on the sidewalk to where a tree was blocking the sun and started taking pictures. while i  was doing that it seemed to be floating are drifting closer to me. as it got closer i noticed it was taking the shape of a circle with the two orbs directly across from each other one was at 12:00 and the other at the 6:00 position. then the orb at the 12:00 position moved around the circle to the 6:00 position. at that point i noticed that the whole circle was starting to rotate clockwise. it seemed as if a small cloud(for lack of a better word)started to form and rotate to about the 9:00 position, the orb that was at 6:00 moved around the circle and disappeared into the cloud. then another orb appeared in front of the circle it went into the circle between the 7:00@8:00 position and disappeared in the same small cloud, the orb that had moved first from 12:00 to 6:00 also disappeared. at that point the circle itself seemed to go through the small cloud that had formed and then started dissipating. i took 20 pictures of it in about 3 min. i don't know how long it had been there before i saw it. the picture number081549 has the orb in front of the circle, my camera was zoomed out if you zoom in and look in front of the circle about halfway to the tree you should see it. the next picture 081600 shows the orb entering the circle between 7:00@8:00.
content.summary: Saw two glowing orbs with a white line between them,as it got closer it changed to a circle, one orb moved around the circle to the other orb, the circle began to rotate,the other orb moved about one quarter way around the circle and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I literally watched these orbs follow me all the way back home they are having over my house in numbers of about 50 if i had to guess.  cops everywhere in this town plans choppers. i can't believe no body see this. now we understand the ebola scare. again the brother one's have a hypnotic affect. you can lock on and focus and it's lock onto you and and tart moving around and you can suggest direction in your head and it'll do it
content.summary: I reported countless spheres while visiting a friend in salinas just yesterday well about half way home i notice some familiar friends traveling with me

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching blue angles with 100's of people on rooftops. i used my iphone6 to shoot several slow mo videos of blue angles. never getting them quite right above me. 

5 days later, i watched the videos and when i saw them in slo-mo (they were shot at 240fps) i saw something pretty incredible. 

there must be 100's of videos like that, 10,000+ people were watching the blue angles. i did not see anything in real time and you cannot really see anything in real time on the video either. 

but since i was shooting at 240fps, at slow mo, object moving across the sky, making a loop to "look" at the flying blue angles, while they look almost still and taking off at 10-100x the speed of the jet planes is clearly visible. 

i have the original video, untouched on my iphone 6. it could be validated by experts. you could also ask on local tv station for other people who shot 3:27:00 - 3:28:00pm in high speed!
other people must have much better video of this. 

there were hundreds of people who must have shot this and just did not realize what is on their videos.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo only visible at 240 fps recording of blue endless - there must be hundreds of these videos

content.detailedDescription: While driving east on the highway headed home i noticed something in the sky headed in the direction of the airport but it was extremely low to be landing at the airport. also it was an odd shaped object as it appeared to be triangular in shape. i noticed it had white lights placed along the sides of the object and also along the back end of the object. there was a single red light blinking underneath or in between the rows of white lights. the object appeared to be a very large aircraft but unlike any i've ever seen. it struck me that if this was a airplane it was extremely low if it was on approach to the airport which was at least 5-7 miles away. i first observed it as it was traveling from northeast to southwest as it crossed over the highway. i was listening to music in my vehicle and didn't hear any noise from the craft which was odd since a plane that low would have easily been heard even over the music. it was flying slowly like a small propeller plane on approach for landing. it passed in front of me and continued on its southwest course and i didn't see it after it passed over the highway. i was puzzled by this craft as i am a retired air force service member and quite familiar with most kinds of aircraft.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with white lights down the sides and across the back of the triangle with a red flashing light underneath near the point of the triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my dad's front porch around 830pm eastern time on october 9th with my sister and dad and i noticed a bright light rising above a tree at a distance and didn't think anything of it until it paused in the sky followed by two more light behind it. my sister then noticed it and it got my dad's attention and the lights were extremely bright on the bigger object. we went out into his side yard and my sister took a few pictures of it and a video as it was almost hovering in the sky and out of no where the bigger object just takes off at a speed that i can't even describe and followed by the other 2 lights which weren't as fast. it shot out over a cow feild and where my dad lives it's really quiet so you can hear everything. so after it stopped over the cow field you could hear the cows making noises for a few seconds and then it got quiet. none of the objects made any kind of sound even at the speeds they were traveling. the light stayed out at a distance for a little while just flashing which a very bright light. after a little while of looking at it my sister left and as she was driving home my dad noticed something when he looked straight up and told me to look and it was a very large object maybe about the size of a large aircraft but it was so cloudy out that night all you could see were some of the lights. it to was quiet and it took off and was out of sight. what we saw that night was real and i'm not exactly sure what it was but it got my attention and it was really interesting. we have photos of the objects and would really like to find out what we saw.
content.summary: What i saw was something i've never seen before and made me want to contact this site.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Walking the dog
2. looking down my street noticing a plane above
3. that's huge and definitely not any aircraft in this world, looks like something i'd see in a star trek movie.
4. huge hovering slowly to my left making very odd noises.
5.Excited and then rushing to find my phone to take a video then went to back of my house to see if it's come out the other side of the tree line but never did.
6. answer 5
content.summary: Was a massive disc shaped hover object slowly  going over till the trees were in the way

content.detailedDescription: 18.10.2014, 21:15h i was driving to my home and i saw in the sky a fire ball moving fast down... i thought was a comet in contact with the atemosphere and fallig down, i pay much atention cause i never saw one before so i was watching it. few seconds after the light was gone and i thought the comet was destroyed few seconds after i was surprised because the light cames back but this time was not moving like before it was the same light but i can not say it was hovered in the sky cause i was driving i had not so sure about the movement, and then the light was gone again. i went to my home and i told my mother and sister what i saw was not something normal and maybe i had the chance to watch a ufo with my own eyes. some time later arround 23:30 i must to get my father, he was working, when we came back home i saw the same light... near us... in our direction it was not to high, i was excited and i said my father i saw it before maybe it's a ufo... my father didn't belive me he is a skeptical person.The light shout down again and we just could see litles lights red and blue blinking, i wanted to stop the car but i could not. my father opened the window of the car and he put the head out to take a look cause that thing passed over us. there were any noice... was not a plane was too close of us to be a plane there were any noice and there are no planes around this area. in the next day i spoke about this again to my family and my father said the shape of it was a circle shape. i'm gratefull because i saw something that not every persons can see everyday, for myself it's hard to belive but i saw it, they are watching us. we just need to pay atention and have a a open mind to accept them existence. i thought was a good idea to share my own experience with a ufo sighting. maybe can help a little bit to our mental evolution. thank you
content.summary: Like a fire ball in the air with stregth movements and lights

content.detailedDescription: Walked back to hotel room at around 2:00am sunday morning in primm, nv on 10/19/14 when my wife and i noticed a pulsating object over the mountains just east- southeast of hotel. we were watching it as it hovered over the mountains rising but did not appear to be moving in any direction. about 5 minutes of watching this object my wife noticed another one more north of the current one. this other one was much further away but also pulsating with the same blue, green, white, and red lights. both objects were over the mountains and appeared to be approaching each other after about 10 minutes. after about 20 minutes, we left the balcony that we were viewing these objects from so i am not sure where they went after 2:30am.
content.summary: Observed strange pulsating object over mountains east - southeast of primm valley resort hotel.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my front garden at about 17.00/17.30, on monday the 6th of october, playing with my dog, when i just looked up to the sky. at first it was nice blue skies, then from no where this bright white almost illuminance egg shaped object appeared, it seemed to come from out of the atmosphere, because it seemed to grow in size. then it disappeared back the way it came. my feelings at the time was one of amazement,wonderment, and sadness. the sadness was because it was over so quickly, and i had no-one else around to verify what i saw. it has affected me in a way i never thought possible, i have told other family members, and friends about my sighting, however the majority of them think i'm seeing things, or that i need to visit my doctor. i know what i observed was not natural, it just doesn,t happen! it could not have been the sun, the moon, because of where it was in the sky, it was 350degrees north, manchester, england. so that rules out the sun and moon. and it wasn,t either of them. this was huge!
content.summary: Was like a gigantic bright white illuminating light that seemed to just appear, then seem to grow bigger then disapear into the the sky/atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting outside at around 11pm oct 16 2012 ,a white lihgt flew over our heads at a high rate of speed descending over tree line southeast of our home,aproxemntly 5 seconds after an explosien like weve never seen occurd over tree line in same direction,colors were amazing violet ,redish, then 5-10 seconds late the ground shook with boom and shop wallsbehind house vibrated, the next day a radar image was submitted on facebook and other sources of the flight path,other witnesses seen and heard same thing. the day after this was released it was gone..No where to be found erased from all sources.Pic of radar i saved was gone from cell phone also.Then story was released that the amunition plant in minden just south of my location had an explosion,,same time as we witnessed fireball across the sky..News claimed faulty storage caused explosion.No mention of firebal made on any source has been posted since. on the live witnesses claims..And my wife and i witnessed this.
content.summary: Light flew over at high rate of speed,crashe out of sight explosien heard and shook ground and house

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i saw a triangle craft on saturday night at 7:45 in the evening. it was dark and we were driving on n williams, heading south. i looked up and saw the classic triangle shaped craft, discernible only by it's lights; a white light in each of the 3 corners, and a flashing red one in the middle. it looked to be as far away from the car as a really low-flying helicopter (100-150 feet?), and about as big as one. it was dark, so i never got to see the craft, just it's lights. my husband thought it was a helicopter, but they have a red and green light close together near the front, and have more lights than this object had.

it looked like the belgian ufo picture, as far as proportion and light arrangement. i was surprised it wasn't bigger - i've heard so many stories of huge triangles. it was only in view for 6-8 seconds before it banked almost sideways and moved off to the left, blocked by buildings (2-3 stories). i only saw the bottom, but didn't notice anything on the sides - the motion was too quick. the white lights weren't round and near the corners like some drawings, they were at the very edge of each of the corners, and were an unusual pentagon-shape. there appeared to be a grid design on them.

the traffic (and my car) were too noisy when i rolled down the window (my husband was driving) to listen. i couldn't hear a helicopter, but then traffic was kind of heavy and i couldn't hear anything but that. the craft didn't move in any unusual way, and wasn't going all that fast (about copter speed), but the banking almost sideways seemed to be something a copter wouldn't do - too dangerous, and not necessary. it was too slow to be a plane, and it sort of meandered, like it had no particular path in mind. it was to the right of the car, just above and in front of, then wandered over the car before quickly banking and shooting off (while sideways) directly left, where it was hidden by buildings.
content.summary: Noticed triangle shaped craft flying above and slightly forward of our car while driving with my husband. low altitude, size of a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
On my freinds patio
hard.Not to countless orange pulsating.Orbs just above my
strait bright line to syationary positions witnesd orbs in same places everynight.Like it was their lookout they bobbed and wete beaming eachother maybe comuication bit they would aggressivly beam aircraft th at came by and you could then see that aircraft showing signs of abnorimal flight pattern and sometimes stuck almost like a trackter beam. i watched them almost all night they seemed play ful and if you locked you eyes on one and concentratedthey would show signs of recognotion and displsy faster blinking on come towatds you a bit. iwith the really bright ones had a hypnosis kind of thing if you stared. its reslly hard to explain but id love to shsre it . kets say it was.Enlightening.I enjoyed evety night. it was like i could almost pick.Up on petsonalities again hard to explain. it ened everynight when i just got too cold afyer watching them for hours. id go back out eveu now and the and flash my kight all around the sky and they would just start droping down back to their spots and hang out. ive seen a few ufod. this was the most profound and amazingly enlightening event of my life. unfourtunitly they would not show up on my phone camera. beleive me.I treid.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed countless orange orbs. 4 nights in a row softball size i would fash the sky and a.Ton would show up to in vestigaye. also witness mutilcoled. yhat had a hypnosis affect call for details vety hard to explain but important

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were camping at peeler lake in desolation wilderness. the event took place our second day around 10-11 at night. we had been starung at the sky there all weekend because you could see the cosmic dust in the galaxy and the open sky was great for stargazing. the night of the event we had seen a good amount of shooting stars. at one point my friend pointed one out that moved oddly, but seemed to be the same distance as the shooting stars. we continued to watch as it entered the atmosphere then stopped directly ahead of us just above the horizon. i can still point out the exact spot. after it stopped, with a somewhat bright light, it blasted an even greater bright light then took off. we were able to watch the object zig zag (3-4 switchbacks) into space for about 10-15 seconds. what made us think its was unearthly was 1) distance 2)speed 3)directional change and 4)light. there was no specific shape except for the light orb it produced. sky was perfectly clear. i was surprised by the object because for 1 i have been afraid of extraterrestrial life since i was 8 and 2, i had convinced myself they weren't real or i would never see one because it was a way to cope with my fear. i was more surprised than my friend. actually let out a "whooooooah! no way!" there may have been other witnesses seeing that it was a holiday weekend and many others in the area. no photo or video because we did not have out phones on us at the time, nor were we thinking about taking a picture.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw what looked like a shooting star, object then stopped, sat in the sky for a few seconds, brightened, then zig zagged into space

content.detailedDescription:
I'm running in assagador de ricardo in suburbs of benidorm city, and suddenly, view the meteorite pass front of me. the meteorite pass quickly 
(5 seconds only), the heaven is clearly this day. the meteorite pass in
direction south-north, but i dont know the altitude and dimensions.
and suddenly disapears at heaven, i think that the meteorite pass near
from the earth, but not in the atmosphere.
content.summary: Pass front of me in 5 seconds like simple meteorites does

content.detailedDescription:
Date& time: oct.12, 2014 from 5:39pm mst to 6:05pm
location: new norway, alberta, canada.

at first an object that looked like a bright planet appears above my internet dish north of me.
approximate in the position of where the north star is located in the night sky.

the sun is just setting and the sky is still deep blue. there are no stars or planets visible yet.
my first thought is that it is an airplane landing light coming toward us but it is moving to slow.

i get my sister, my daughter and my wife to come and look. i get my canon rebel t5i camera with a 250mm lens and start to take pictures. 

after about 15 min. it has moved towards us to the south only about 5 degrees. it is getting bigger and brighter as it gets closer.

my sister and i stay and keep watching. my daughter and wife return to the house.
suddenly my sister and i see the object make a small jump in motion. like a small s curve. 
now i am convinced that we are watching some thing unusual.

about 5min later it appears to turn on its side dimming in brightness and splits into 5 smaller objects that travel downward dipping into the earths shadow and disappears. 
my sister is excited to finally see a ufo, i have had several experiences since i was a young child. it seems to be putting on a show for us.

i have 15 photos of this object, 4 of them are of the 5 smaller objects.
content.summary: Planet like object traveling slowly to the south out fo the north for 20 min. aprox. it then split in to 5 smaller objects that desended down

content.detailedDescription:
At ~ 12 am 10/19/2014 i was walking home from neighbors house to my home. i looked up to my right in the sky. the cluod cover was broken. probably alto cumulus. i observed 4 lights rotating in a counter clockwise direction, viewed from the ground. the lights would expand outward to a maximum diameter and then shrink back to a single focal point and repeat. the period of rotation was ~ 2 seconds . the period of max diameter to focal point was ~ 10 seconds.  the light was only visible because it was hitting the clouds. the length of the light beam was longest at the max diameter  and of course smallest at the focal point -- probably 5 times as long  compared to its length at the focal point. there is an uncontrolled airport --doylestown airport  - in that direction-  but i do not know of any distress or navigation aid that makes that pattern.  i could not convince myself if the light was from above the clouds or below the clouds.  if below the the clouds you might expect to see the a beam shaft --- there was none. i called my friends out to observe ..They were amazed -  stumped as well. my friends wife asked if we were in danger.
i have an iphone 4 and took snap shots and video --- nothing shows up however -
maybe you have enhanced capability.

the lights eventually stopped after ~ 15 minutes.  the center of rotation seemed to drift to the left(south)as time progressed   -but only slightly

i can send you my digital files later if you'd like
content.summary: 4 rotating lights expanding and decreasing diameter of rotation

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed beginning on 10/19 approx 10 pm to just past midnight at about 30degrees above sunset, woke up at 6.00am on 10/20 and bright star like object at 12 o'clock high, directly above was gleaming like a diamond in the sky.  looked through binoculars and object was still dancing in the stratisphere.  i was very happy to see object this morning, i've always been laughed at for my belief about ufo's for nearly 30 years now.  object currently still directly over head.
content.summary: Dancing in the stars

content.detailedDescription: It happen 5 minutes till 6,me and my friend walked outside for a cig,we had 5 minutes before married with children came on,soon as we turn the corner from his dads house we was hit by a bright beam ,he turn around to look at me and said what the hell was that, it only lasted 1-2 seconds, for some reason i looked up,all i could see was big pine trees, no lights ,no noise, nothng. i walked 20 steps to the road to see it a street light blowed out couseing the flash beam,only there was no street lights there, so we walked back in the house to our amazement, married with children was going off , we lost 1 hour sigh . we really freaked out over the hour lost but my friends dad was a preacher and abductions was not in there vocabulary . the next day or the first day of my change, all my hair fell out in my bed , the feeling of being bald at 19 was ruff, i took my shirt off for some reason and looked in the mirror and a spot around 1/2 the size of a penny with the pigment gone, perfect circle, with a small red dot in the middle was on my spine about hafe way down my back. i still think about it almost daily , wife is cathoilic, so is mom ,so is my son so there is no one that believes, even when i do things like the last day i saw my dad 6 years ago, i cry and told wife and son lets leave, told dad bye and i love him which was never said my whole life, wife ask whats  the tears for, i reply ill never see my dad again, he will die in a few days, 3days later he died. the effects from this only allows me to see things, bad things that only effect me , in my 30 years after, i seemed to have cheated death 6x, car wrecks mostly with 2x being guns. i cant say for sure what happen which is the worst part for it was just a lost hour in my mind , no visuals of strange beings, but i do see them in my dreams, there small,and always hovering above me but still i don't see there faces only real colorful mask , every time there showing me something, usally its the number 3 involved. sorry for the typos and ty for your time. the time is exact and year is appx but i read the newspapers all my life and a few days after my sighting there was more ppl that saw disc that day or the day after. email me back if you would like to hear some dreams or more details, i did see the disc the night after but tierd now,ty again
content.summary: I only see what they look like from my dreams,which could mean nothing

content.detailedDescription: I was on my west unobstructed view balcony, looking at a cluster of what looked like stars and noticed the star cluster flickering. so, i got my binoculars out and held them against a chair arm to stabilize and watched it dance.  it's 12:47am right now and its still going on.  i've been following robert bingham and have been trying his technique of calling out the ufo's daily for about a week.  i was ecstatic this evening finally seeing one for the first time, im sure it wasn't me but i am real happy to experience this evenings event.
content.summary: Just dncing, squiggling all night long

content.detailedDescription: I was in train,going to my classes,the flyover between dahisar and borivali rail path was just passed and i was standing near the door,i was looking at the moon that time and tried to observe the stars around it,as i was searching for stars i observed the area near moon when i saw a airplane flying high near the moon,suddenly i noticed a bright white starlike light i thought it was a star but it was actually moving i thought it was another airplane but it was at very great height and it was a airplane it would have been leaving trails of smoke behind it and there were also no blinking lights around it like in a airplane,it wasn't also a breaking star because it didn't have any tail behind it,the object was flying faster thsn any airplane,it appeared in the east side of the moon and travelled in a straight line towards the west side and as soon as i took out my cellphone to record it disappeared,i was sure it was a ufo because nithing can travel at such height without leaving and trails of exhaust gases behind it and also few days ago this event i saw some abnormal lighting in mira road west which is totally e.Pty area for salt pans and forest which never appeared there before,i felt that i since i have been watching many shows which reveal about the aliens and thier activities,which are probably against humans i thought is there something like that going on in mira road west? are they planning a attack against humans?Whole day i kept on thinking about that object and tried to relate it to that unidentied light in mira road west,i thought to record it as no one believed in what i said about the lights in mira road west but as soon as i took out my cellphone it just vanished away i tried to search it everywhere around the moon and from that day i always keep an eye on the moon for more proofs of ufos
content.summary: Ufo which flew near the moon in morning

content.detailedDescription: 23.08.2014 a ufo like stucture seen near kolkata in west bengal,india(actual place is near bhadreswer and mankundu railway station which is near to kolkata).At 8 pm.A disc like circular stucture is moved in straight line way.With ita a random speeed like 120km/hr.Its surface are dark and with the bright light band.And it is rotated on its own axis .The flying object some times stop and again move on.The whole event is over the lonely farming feild.It will seen by me when i traveling through train.Not one time its regularly seen by me and other train passengers in between one month but now we can see it.And after this event on preveous night next morning i observed that 2-3 helicopters are moved over this spot of event may for serching something.There have 4-5 factory from about 4-5 km from the spot of event.
content.summary: Its disc like stucture .Surrounded by a white band of light.3 lights on its base .2 red 1 green.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in troutdale oregon. at approximately 20:15 i noticed an odd light flying east to west. then another then another, then multiple more. that's when i grabbed my phone to get video.
  they were all very bright orange red kinda yellow. all on the same flight path. about the same size as a commercial airliner. there was no noise associated with them. no red and green lights like an airplane would have. i observed them for about 2 minutes. they flew a little faster than the commercial jets i see heading towards pdx. on a slightly more northing path. 
  in all i saw at least 16. all the same size, and shape. all on the same path but a little farther apart. in a fairly rapid succession. sometimes just one, sometimes 4 close together.
  living about 10 miles from pdx there were also commercial airliners in the sky. these looked much different and were a little faster, and higher. they also appeared to be larger.
 i was able to watch them nearly horizon to horizon, ( blocked by trees). i've never seen anything like it, the only thing i could compare it to is the videos of scud missiles over kuwait.
  in my video they are hard to see but you can. i believe someone would be able to zoom in.
   my son also noticed them while he was riding home from a party. he only saw two of them. he's 11.
content.summary: 16 bright orange lights flying overhead east to west.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving to the store at 7:23pm cst on 10/18/2014 when we both observed several glowing objects in the sky just above the tree tops.  we live in the northern suburbs of minneapolis, mn.  as we traveled to the west we counted 6-10 randomly pulsating lights hovering 35 to 40 degrees above the horizon and appeared to form a triangular pattern .  i fly r/c aircraft at night so i'm familiar with aircraft navigation lighting/acs strobes.  these lights were definitely not commercial or civilian aircraft. we did see an aircraft traveling to the south of the glowing objects.  we did lose sight of the objects for about 5 seconds as we were driving due to trees in the area.  the lights suddenly vanished 90 seconds after we started our drive.
content.summary: Observed 6-10 objects in a triangular formation in western sky west of twin cities
